value.title: How to beat the 1v7 INSANE AI Challenge (no, Beastyqt has not done it) #2 - StarCraft 2
value.excerpt: I have challenged StarCraft 2 Pros to take on 7 Random INSANE Cheater AIs at once! Serral has said it is impossible unless maybe they're all Zergs. After Spirit (Soul) tried it first, the next person brave enough to try it is PiLiPiLi, a Protoss player. He took on 7 Random insane AIs all on Any Build.

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.
